text: Moses is a statue that was made by Michelangelo. It is a statue of Moses from the Bible. The statue is unusual because Moses has horns on his head. This was one of Michelangelo's last projects. ==Related pages== The following are other statues by Michelangelo: *David *Piet√† ==Other websites== * http://www.romaviva.com/Santa-Maria-Maggiore/moses.htm Website with more information on Moses. title: Moses (Michelangelo)
